title: Must Read: Savage X Fenty Teams Up With Diesel, Billie Eilish Covers 'Vogue'
description: These are the stories making headlines in fashion on Tuesday. Savage X Fenty teams up with DieselSavage X Fenty is collaborating with Diesel on a limited-edition lingerie and apparel capsule.
